name: FrontDesk
0:
”Alexa, ask Front Desk to check me in.”
”Alexa, tell Front Desk there is a delivery.”
”Alexa, tell Front Desk I need a signature.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: front desk
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A free Front Desk account, and Slack workspace with the Front Desk Slack app installed are the minimum requirements to use this skill.

Simplify your office's visitor registration. Front Desk is the easiest visitor management system available. Be up and running in only 10 minutes.

Front Desk knows your team members with Slack. Whenever anyone in your Slack team receives a visitor, Front Desk sends them a notification.

When a visitor arrives, they check in by saying

Alexa, ask Front Desk to check me in

and Front Desk walks them through a simple registration conversation, then notifies the team member they have come to see in Slack.

When a delivery arrives, they can notify your team by saying

Alexa, tell Front Desk there is a delivery

or request a signature by saying

Alexa, tell Front Desk I need a signature

When someone forgets their keys at their desk (not judging, we've been there)

Alexa, tell Front Desk I'm locked out

To get started you will need to link your Front Desk account and install the Slack app in your slack workspace. Once the skill is installed say

Alexa, link my account with Front Desk

then, to install the Slack app visit

https://tryfrontdesk.co/install

That's all there is to it, enjoy
